channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Physics Wallah enjoys a rosy IPO day, bucking the broader slowdown in Indian edtech
item.description: The Indian edtech startup ended its first day as a public company on a high, with its shares closing 44% higher than they were listed for, indicating that the country's edtech sector may still recover after years of gloom.

item.title: Cloudflare blames massive internet outage on ‘latent bug’
item.description: An outage at internet infrastructure giant Cloudflare took down several big websites and services, including ChatGPT, Claude, Spotify, and X.

item.title: Best Early Black Friday Mattress Deals 2025
item.description: Some of the best sales of the year are happening right now—rest up before the holiday rush with a new bed.

item.title: Organizations must own the right to their cloud compute, or innovation will suffer
item.description: The future of digital sovereignty and responsible AI use depends on infrastructure autonomy.

item.title: Voici les 16 produits Tech pas chers pour se faire plaisir à petit prix lors du pré-Black Friday : la sélection à moins de 100 €
item.description: Le véritable Black Friday approche et parmi les nombreuses offres déjà disponibles, il est possible de se faire plaisir même avec un budget qui ne dépasse pas les 100 euros. Avis aux petits budgets, voici les meilleures offres qui valent le coup.

item.title: The Criterion Collection is having a 50% off sale at Amazon for Black Friday – here are my 9 closet picks from the deals
item.description: The Criterion Collection has knocked 50% off tons of its 4K Blu-rays, so there's no better time to add to your shelves!

item.title: This new Razer headset is perfect for PC gaming and is already at its lowest-ever price for Black Friday
item.description: The Razer BlackShark V3 Wireless is at a massive discount for Black Friday.

item.title: Panne mondiale d’Internet : Cloudflare est en train de résoudre le problème
item.description: Une panne massive de Cloudflare secoue Internet. Une montagne de sites web s'est retrouvée inaccessible pendant plusieurs heures. Cloudflare est finalement parvenu à localiser et à résoudre la panne. Un « correctif a été déployé et nous pensons que l'incident est désormais résolu », explique Cloudflare.

item.title: Même débranchés des serveurs, les vieux thermostats Nest continuent d’envoyer des données à Google
item.description: Google a beau avoir débranché les premiers thermostats Nest, ces appareils continuent d’envoyer des données vers les serveurs de l’entreprise. Un chercheur en sécurité a découvert que des journaux d’activité — parfois très détaillés — circulent toujours en arrière-plan, malgré la fin officielle du support.

item.title: Waymo removes safety drivers in Miami ahead of 2026 launch
item.description: Waymo said it will do the same in Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, and Orlando in the coming weeks -- the latest steps in the company's continued expansion across the U.S.

item.title: Smartphones Samsung, Apple, Google, Nothing… la sélection des offres les plus alléchantes sur ce pré Black Friday
item.description: La Black Week approche à grands pas ! Mais cela fait déjà depuis le début du mois que smartphones sont à prix cassés. Les étals des e-commerçants ne désemplissent pas de réductions en tout genre. Nous avons rassemblé ici les offres les plus intéressantes sur les smartphones premium.

item.title: Microsoft’s new Anthropic partnership brings Claude AI models to Azure
item.description: Microsoft is announcing a strategic partnership with Anthropic today that will bring the AI startup’s models to Microsoft Foundry for the first time. As part of the deal, Anthropic is also committing to purchasing $30 billion of Azure compute capacity and “to contract additional compute capacity up to one gigawatt.” Microsoft Foundry customers will now be able […]...

item.title: Vibe coding to vibe hacking: securing software in the AI era
item.description: Vibe coding's speed risks vulnerabilities without human accountability and scrutiny.

item.title: Xiaomi n’épargne aucun de ses produits durant le pré-Black Friday : le TOP 16 des offres
item.description: Xiaomi multiplie les offres avant le véritable Black Friday, y compris sur ses derniers modèles. Plusieurs références récentes sont proposées à prix réduit, assurant un excellent rapport qualité-prix. Voici les produits de la marque que l'on recommande sans hésiter.

item.title: The New ‘Project Hail Mary’ Trailer Shows What the Movie Is Really About
item.description: Ryan Gosling stars in the new sci-fi film from directors Phil Lord and Chris Miller, out March 20, 2026.

item.title: This notorious Russian surveillance tech maker has been hacked - could it be the end for Protei?
item.description: Someone defaced the Protei website and stole gigabytes of data including emails dating back years.

item.title: The sovereignty shift: how UK and Irish SMEs can regain control of their data
item.description: Amid rising data concerns, UK and Irish SMEs are urged to reclaim control through digital sovereignty.

item.title: Pénurie de mémoire, Nvidia et AMD vont stopper des cartes graphiques, c’est le moment ou jamais d’acheter avant que le marché ne crève le plafond
item.description: Le spectre de la « memoryflation » plane sur l'industrie. Alors que les prix de la RAM et du stockage s'envolent, les constructeurs de cartes graphiques et de PC envisagent des mesures drastiques : suppression de modèles, report de lancements et hausse généralisée des tarifs.

item.title: Comparatif : quelles sont les meilleures enceintes Bluetooth en 2025 ?
item.description: Pratique, compacte, l'enceinte Bluetooth sans fil nous accompagne autant à la maison qu'en déplacement ou en vacances. On vous propose ici une sélection pointue des meilleures enceintes Bluetooth que nous avons pu tester.

item.title: Orange lance le premier forfait mobile par satellite, mais pas pour tout le monde
item.description: L'opérateur Orange devient le premier d'Europe à proposer un abonnement pour envoyer des SMS par satellite. Voici ce qu'il faut savoir.

item.title: The 26 Best Advent Calendars (2025): We Opened Every Door
item.description: Treat yourself or someone else to days of little gifts, ranging from sweet treats and savory beverages to beauty products and toys. We found a tiny door for everyone.

item.title: I have a new favorite VR headset and it's all thanks to Black Friday
item.description: The Meta Quest 3 is my usual go-to VR headset, but this Black Friday there's a new king in town.

item.title: 5 Black Friday security software deals you can't afford to miss: quality savings on all your security essentials
item.description: Keep your data and devices protected this Black Friday with my roundup of the best discounts that are half price or more.

item.title: Welp, Smart Earrings Are a Thing Now
item.description: Lumia is ready to release its health-tracking smart earrings to the masses.

item.title: The best Christmas gifts for gamers and movie lovers
item.description: Most of us in the Northern Hemisphere spend the holidays indoors, but you can only watch so many TikToks about cute cats and cooking hacks before the need for something a little more substantive kicks in. Choosing the right game or movie to gift is tough, though, especially if you don't have an exact read […]

item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Home Depot misses third-quarter earnings expectations, cuts outlook
item.description: The company attributed the missed earnings to less storm damage and more anxious shoppers. Home Depot‘s third-quarter was mixed with fewer violent storms reaching shore, more anxiety among U.S. consumers, and a housing market that is in a deep funk.

item.title: Cloudflare Outage Takes Down Huge Chunk of the Internet, Slowly Coming Back Online
item.description: Amazon, X, Spotify, ChatGPT, Grindr, Canva, and many more are struggling to stay online.

item.title: One of the best dual-zone air fryers has a record-low price – this early Black Friday deal might be Thanksgiving prep boost you need
item.description: The spacious and versatile Ninja Foodi Max dual-zone air fryer gets a big price drop ahead of Black Friday

item.title: I tested 15 cases for the Switch 2 and these are the best
item.description: Editor’s note: Black Friday doesn’t officially take place until Friday, November 28th; however, if you want to shop ahead of time, we’ve rounded up the best early Black Friday deals you can already get. You might find it kind of sad to put your hard-earned Switch 2 into a protective case. To me, it’s freeing. Using a case […]

item.title: Pourquoi la moitié du web ne répond plus : voilà à quoi sert Cloudflare
item.description: Bon. Vous avez sans doute passé un mauvais moment ce midi. Impossible d'accéder à ChatGPT, des images qui ne chargent pas sur X, et même Frandroid aux abonnés absents. Le coupable s'appelle Cloudflare.

item.title: Cloudflare outage cause revealed: This is what happened.
item.description: We're starting to get answers about what happened to bring down Cloudflare and large portions of the internet.

item.title: Orange lance “Message Satellite”, le premier abonnement mobile par satellite en France
item.description: L’opérateur français vient de dévoiler l’arrivée de « Message Satellite », la première offre européenne permettant d’envoyer des SMS par satellite depuis votre smartphone, dans les zones blanches.

item.title: James Cameron Promises Blood for an ‘Alita: Battle Angel’ Sequel
item.description: Plus, Russell T Davies says 'Doctor Who' has something to prove with its new spinoff, 'The War Between the Land and the Sea'.

item.title: PS5, Xbox Series, Nintendo Switch 2… quelle console de jeux choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: PlayStation 5 ou 5 Pro, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, Steam Deck, ROG Ally… voici notre comparatif des meilleures consoles de jeux en 2025, de salon ou portable. Amis gamers, amies gameuses, découvrez laquelle est faite pour vous.

item.title: Larry Summers to step back from public commitments after Epstein emails
item.description: The released documents showed personal correspondence between Summers and Epstein. Former U.S. Treasury Secretary Larry Summers said on Monday he will step back from all public commitments, days after President Donald Trump ordered the Justice Department to investigate his and other prominent Democrats’ ties to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein....

item.title: Aspirateurs robots, air fryer, lumières connectées… Le Black Friday en avance a de belles promotions sur la maison connectée
item.description: Robot aspirateur, friteuse sans huile, ampoules intelligentes, caméras de sécurité... Les indispensables de la maison connectée sont déjà en promotion à l'occasion des offres anticipées du Black Friday. C'est le moment idéal pour se lancer dans la domotique ou compléter son installation avec notre sélection des meilleures offres disponibles.

item.title: L’éclatement de la bulle IA n’épargnera personne, prévient le patron de Google
item.description: Pour certains investisseurs, ce n'est pas tellement une question de si mais de quand la bulle IA explosera. Et lorsque cela arrivera, quelles seront les entreprises les plus touchées ? Le patron de Google a une petite idée sur la question.

item.title: 14 Best Housewarming Gifts We Can't Stop Using (2025): Coasters, Blenders, Sheets
item.description: Make a house into a home with these gifts, whether your recipient is moving into their first house or a great new apartment.

item.title: Grindr and other gay dating apps down
item.description: Grindr and Sniffies, and potentially other gay dating apps are currently down.

item.title: Amazon is almost giving away the Fire TV Stick 4K Select ahead of Black Friday
item.description: The Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K Select is only $9.99 at Amazon ahead of Black Friday for select customers. That's a 75% discount.

item.title: Samsung frappe fort à lors du pré-Black Friday avec ses 20 bonnes affaires à saisir
item.description: Samsung fait partie de ces constructeurs proposant tout un tas de produits Tech. Et, pour en profiter aux meilleurs prix, quoi de mieux que le pré-Black Friday ? De nombreuses références du constructeur sont en promotion, mais nous avons sélectionné uniquement les meilleures offres.

item.title: Cloudflare down: What we know about the outage so far
item.description: Cloudflare is experiencing global issues, the service confirmed on Tuesday morning.

item.title: Windscribe's entire VPN network gets a next-gen speed and stability boost
item.description: It's a huge day for Windscribe users as "FreshScribe," a year-long project to overhaul its entire server network, is now live for everyone.

item.title: It’s not your job to fix the internet
item.description: The concept of enshittification, as coined by the author and activist Cory Doctorow, just feels right. Whether you're searching on Google, shopping on Amazon, or scrolling on Facebook, large platforms often feel like they're not trying to bring us value so much as extract every bit of value they can out of us. It wasn't […]

item.title: Lego's official Black Friday sale is less than two weeks away, but here are 6 early deals I'd buy right now
item.description: With less than two weeks until Black Friday, Lego's confirmed it's now an annual sale and is teasing some impressive discounts across major themes.

item.title: Princeton University data breach hits students, alumni - here's what we know
item.description: Names, email addresses, and postal addresses were taken, but Princeton says financial information remains secure.

item.title: A Simple WhatsApp Security Flaw Exposed 3.5 Billion Phone Numbers
item.description: By plugging tens of billions of phone numbers into WhatsApp’s contact discovery tool, researchers found “the most extensive exposure of phone numbers” ever—along with profile photos and more.

item.title: Zoox will let public riders use its robotaxis in San Francisco
item.description: Zoox is getting closer to a full launch of its robotaxi service in San Francisco. Last month, the Amazon-owned company started allowing select riders to hail its toaster-shaped, four-passenger vehicles for the first time. And today, Zoox is finally inviting members off its public waitlist, which it calls “Zoox Explorers,” to do the same. The […]

item.title: Wyze’s budget-friendly smart lock gets a Wi-Fi upgrade without a price increase
item.description: Wyze has announced a new version of its electronic door lock that features Wi-Fi, allowing it to be controlled remotely from anywhere using a mobile app or voice commands through Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. The original Wyze Lock Bolt is currently featured in our smart lock buyer’s guide as the “best budget smart(ish) lock,” […]

item.title: Agentio secures $40 million from Forerunner as it scales its creator marketplace beyond YouTube
item.description: Agentio, which matches creators with brands, is expanding beyond YouTube and testing Meta platforms to facilitate sponsored content.

item.title: Boop’s new app turns social recommendations into bookable itineraries
item.description: Instead of getting an AI-generated travel plan, Boop aims to give users access to itineraries from real people who went on real trips.

item.title: Stack Overflow is remaking itself into an AI data provider
item.description: Stack Overflow wants to remake its classic problem-solving forum into a tool for translating human expertise into an AI-accessible format.

item.title: Zoox to begin offering robotaxi rides to public in San Francisco
item.description: This is not a large-scale public launch, nor a commercial one. But it brings the Amazon-owned company one step closer to competing with Waymo.

item.title: Zap Energy ramps up the pressure in its latest fusion device
item.description: Zap Energy's Fuze-3 device has generated record plasma pressures for the startup's unique approach to fusion power.

item.title: Creator Tayla Cannon recieves $1.1 million investment from Slow Ventures’ creator fund to build PT software
item.description: Tayla Cannon's Rebuildr receives $1.1 million investment from Slow Ventures

item.title: Bose's 5-star QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds (2nd Gen) just dropped to their lowest ever price – run to grab these!
item.description: Bose's 2025-release noise-nixing earbuds just dropped to their lowest ever price and for this money, I say buy now!

item.title: The 30 most bike-friendly cities in the world
item.description: The 2025 Copenhagenize Index shows which cities have done the most—from redesigning streets to growing bike share systems and building bike storage—to make it easy to get around on two wheels. Over the last decade, dozens of cities have reshaped streets around cycling and slower, safer, healthier travel. Take Paris: at rush hour, boulevards that were once packed with cars are now filled with thousands of people on bikes, newly planted trees, and cleaner air....

item.title: Waymo is bringing fully autonomous driving to five more cities
item.description: The robotaxi company is removing the human driver from its pilot programs across two states—the latest sign of its increasing ability to scale. Before Waymo was Waymo, it was Google’s self-driving car project. Starting in 2009, the effort spent many years in test mode—with humans in the driver’s seats ready to take over, just in case—that its vision of vehicular autonomy often felt far from practical reality....

item.title: Impression 3D : Bambu Lab dévoile la H2C avec changement automatique de têtes
item.description: Vous connaissez le "poop" en impression 3D ? Ces montagnes de filament gaspillé quand on change de couleur, cette tour de purge qui consomme parfois plus de plastique que l'objet lui-même. Bambu Lab promet d'y mettre fin avec le H2C, une imprimante qui change de tête d'impression au lieu de nettoyer la buse.

item.title: Cloudflare outage takes down X one month after Musk mocked AWS customers
item.description: The infrastructure service Cloudflare faced massive outages on Tuesday morning, cutting off access to ChatGPT, Claude, Spotify, X, and other platforms.

item.title: I've spent the past month testing the Bambu Lab H2C 3D printer and it's not what I was expecting - it's actually much better
item.description: The H2C is one of the most anticipated machines for a long time, featuring not only a dual head but the Vortek Hot-end Change System. It features six mechanically mounted hot ends that are inductively heated to enable up to 7 colours/materials straight out of the box, and most importantly, a design that creates less waste than previous multifilament machines....

item.title: Une grande partie d’Internet est en panne : que se passe-t-il avec Cloudflare ?
item.description: De nombreux internautes constatent des problèmes d'accès sur des services comme X(Twitter) ou des sites liés à Cloudflare. Une panne est en cours.

item.title: Le jeu vidéo Roblox commence à contrôler l’âge de ses utilisateurs
item.description: L’éditeur du jeu vidéo américain Roblox, régulièrement accusé de ne pas suffisamment protéger ses plus jeunes joueurs, a déployé mardi un système de vérification d’âge, a-t-il annoncé dans un communiqué.

item.title: Pico 4 Ultra : le casque VR rival du Meta Quest 3 s’immerge dans le Black Friday avec 200 € de réduction
item.description: Un casque VR premium sous la barre des 400 euros ? C’est le Pico 4 Ultra qui profite du Singles Day pour afficher son prix à 399 euros au lieu de 599 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Panne de Cloudflare | Voici pourquoi une partie du web est inaccessible
item.description: Une panne majeure affecte une partie de l’infrastructure internet mardi matin. Le géant américain Cloudflare rencontre des difficultés techniques qui paralysent l’accès à de nombreux services populaires, dont ChatGPT et le réseau social X.
